name: The House Escape Games - start a puzzle challenge
name_original: The House Escape Games - start a puzzle challenge
description:
Friends do you like taking up challenges in your life? Have you ever been in a mostly challenging situations ever before? If no and you like to be in one then here is your chance to be in the mostly challenging game in your life. All you need to do is solve puzzles.

Welcome to Can You Escape The House - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Can You Escape The House - a cool escape game?

As a daredevil, you joined this game called, Who can Escape the house! This is a game show that would showcase your talents for escaping! This intrigued you so much and you decided to join! Now, the challenge for today is, travel to the woods until you find a house! Go inside and there, your challenge begins! Find a way to get out of the house and do it before your time ends! Failure to do so, well, its a surprise! Will you be able to escape the house tasked to you and win this one for yourself? Good luck!


Can You Escape The House is another point and click escape game developed by bamvd. This is your house and you are in a difficult situation now. You are not able to go out of your house as you have lost the key. To escape from the house, you should find the key with the help of clues and hints. Solve puzzles and find the key to escape from the locked house. Have fun!


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!

Enjoy this fun adventure escape game!
